# status

**Instance Property**

Payment authorization general status.

## Declaration

```swift
var status: PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus { get set }
```

## Discussion

See [doc://com.apple.passkit/documentation/PassKit/PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus] for the list of status values.

## Setting payment authorization status and errors

- **errors**: List of errors in the Apple Pay sheet.
- **PKPaymentAuthorizationStatus**: General success and failure status for payment authorization.
